column1: This course covers how an enterprise coordinates and effectively manages all its IT projects and programs through program management and the IT program management office.  Students will learn the role of the IT program management office in establishing and maintaining the project and program infrastructure and in assisting project managers, program managers, and the executive steering committee.  Students will analyze the role of program management in coordinating the delivery of expected program benefits, in managing stakeholder expectations, and in establishing program goverance.  PREREQUISITE(S): IS 430 or PM 430
